Class MetroControl

java.lang.Object
  game.MetroControl

public class MetroControl
extends java.lang.Object

A class to control the MetroEngine class.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam Eary and Tyler Blanchard

Constructor Summary
MetroControl()
          Constructs the control class and instantiates the MetroEngine game object.
 
Method Summary
 void activateDrawPile()
          Activates the Metro draw pile for instances when the player clicks on the draw pile.

getCurrentActiveTile

public int getCurrentActiveTile()
Gets the current active tile in the game. This is the tile that belongs to the player who is currently taking a turn.

Returns:
the current active tile in the game.

getCurrentPlayerNum

public int getCurrentPlayerNum()
Gets the number of the current player in the game. This is the number of the player whose turn it currently is.

Returns:
the number of the current player in the game.

setTile

public void setTile(Position position)
             throws MiddleOfNowhereException,
                    CutoffException
Sets a tile in the game board.

Parameters:
position - The position of the tile.
Throws:
MiddleOfNowhereException - If a tile is not adjacent to any others.
CutoffException - If a tile cuts off another player.
